children.text: This site presents websites made by me.

I started creating the first websites five years ago using CMS, for my own needs and for my professional activity. Mainly it was conceptual work and involved the creation and addition of visual and substantive content. I've created 5 such websites in wix CMS. However, CMS quickly showed its limitations.
In 2018, I started learning how to create websites professionally. In 2019, I also started creating the first pages myself, using HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap. I present them here.
